persistent.name: Fsuels Bot
persistent.description: Runs the show. Delegates work, makes decisions, talks to Francisco. 30% production, 70% routing.

persistent.name: Pressure Loop
persistent.description: After every task: Can this be faster? Automated? Templated? Eliminated? Catches errors, logs learnings, promotes insights.

persistent.name: Deep Dive
persistent.description: Daily scans for competitors, market trends, AI advances, and money-making opportunities. Proactive, not reactive.

onDemand.name: Content()
onDemand.description: Creates content, polishes tone, strips AI fingerprints. Tweets, product descriptions, blog posts, social copy. Spun up only when content is needed.

onDemand.name: Automation()
onDemand.description: Builds scripts, tools, automations. GitHub ops, CI/CD, API integrations. Spun up only when code or infra work is needed.

onDemand.name: Council()
onDemand.description: Grok + ChatGPT + Gemini debate, Opus delivers verdict. Invoked only for high-impact decisions where diverse perspectives matter.

onDemand.name: PromptWork()
onDemand.description: System prompt design, agent architecture, instruction optimization. Used when building or tuning AI agents.
